belongs_to_collection.name: Si Saben Como Me Pongo Collection

original_title: Si saben cómo me pongo ¿Pa' qué me invitan?
overview: Four mismatched couples meet at an exclusive resort in search of new adventures to improve their relationship. All of them will do their best to find the balance with their better half, but to achieve it they will have to overcome the difficult tests that love poses.
title: Si saben cómo me pongo ¿Pa' qué me invitan?
